section.p: 在安全要求较高的场景下，Agora 建议你在加入频道前，调用本方法开启内置加密。
All users in the same channel must use the same encryption mode and encryption key. 用户离开频道后，SDK 会自动关闭加密。 如需重新开启加密，你需要在用户再次加入频道前调用该方法。
section.note: If you enable the built-in encryption, you cannot use the RTMP or RTMPS streaming function.

pd.p:
是否开启内置加密：
: 开启
: 关闭

plentry.pd: Configurations of built-in encryption schemas. 详见 。

ul.li:
< 0: Failure.
-2(ERR_INVALID_ARGUMENT): An invalid parameter is used. Set the parameter with a valid value.
-4(ERR_NOT_SUPPORTED): The encryption mode is incorrect or the SDK fails to load the external encryption library. Check the enumeration or reload the external encryption library.
-7(ERR_NOT_INITIALIZED): The SDK is not initialized. Initialize the instance before calling this method.
